attributes.action: International Students Fee Refund or Visa Extention due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
Following things ccould be considered or offered:
1) Extention of visa on bais of our courses and scheduled modules that got affected, or
2) Extension for finding work and visa transitions, or
3)Refund our tution fees for the year.
attributes.background: Either push the course dates and continue it from the coming year. Or provide a fee refund for the semesters as online teaching isn't helpful or worth what we paid for as international students. We paid a sum of £19,500 plus additional cost relating to accomodatiom, IHS and other costs.

rejection.details:

Reimburse all students of this year’s fees due to strikes and COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302855

Extended Visas indefinitely for International Students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304442
